titles.title: Small Business Relief and Job Creation Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage hiring unemployed individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/30/2013--Introduced. Small Business Relief and Job Creation Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow small business employers whose gross receipts in the preceding taxable year did not exceed $20 million or who did not employ more than 100 full-time employees during the preceding taxable year a work opportunity tax credit for hiring unemployed individuals as full-time employees (at least 30 hours per week) during 2014 or 2015. Doubles the rate of such credit for employers located in counties with high unemployment rates.
